### Belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a Belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5) with direction Direction.UP.

### ERROR TIPS

*   Errors when using connect_entities but being too far: 
    *   Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to connect before connecting.
*   Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity: 
    *   Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement.
*   Errors when trying to insert items into a full chest: 
    *   Make sure the chest has enough space to hold the items before attempting insertion.
*   Errors when trying to extract items from an empty chest: 
    *   Make sure the chest has items to extract before attempting extraction.
*   Errors when trying to fuel an entity with no fuel: 
    *   Make sure the entity has fuel before attempting to use it.
*   Errors when trying to connect pipes to an entity with no fluid input: 
    *   Make sure the entity has a fluid input before attempting to connect pipes.

### NAMESPACE

*   connect_entities: 
    *   This function connects two entities.
    *   It has been invoked and has failed due to the entities being too far apart.
    *   It has also failed due to the target entity not having a fluid input.
*   place_entity: 
    *   This function places an entity on the map.
    *   It has been invoked and has failed due to the tile being occupied by
